data.title: Solve Unknown Problems in Minutes
data.description: Custom deep instrumentation is the key to solving any unknown problem. Get high cardinality, and high dimensional instrumentation through correlated distributed traces, custom metrics, and centralised logs tailored for your services powered by OpenTelemetry

data.title: Own Your Observability
data.description: We build custom observability with telemetry Backend (Open Telemetry), optimised lightning-fast OLAP store (Clickhouse), and dynamic visualisations (Grafana), all on your infrastructure. Observability achieves its full potential when we don’t hesitate to instrument and there’s no SaaS ingestion cost saga involved

data.title: Unmatched Efficiency
data.description: Extensive sampling to store only required telemetry and autoscaling collector based on load. Optimised Clickhouse clusters for your read-write patterns using materialised views, Indexing, and right CodeCS. Sub-second Grafana panels, with custom dashboards for the team's needs

data.title: Custom Telemetry Backend
data.description: Integrate our telemetry backend with custom services, managed services, all languages, and everything you need to observe. We make sure there are no gaps, covering all SLIs and SLOs

data.title: Highly Secure & Compliant
data.description: Can’t share data with vendors? Storage requirement of years? Security compliance? Our solution caters to all your compliance needs effortlessly
